suffix.name: AdFrames.Aggregate
suffix.label: Includes resources loaded across all ad frames on a page.

suffix.name: AdFrames.PerFrame
suffix.label: Includes resources loaded for a single ad frame.

suffix.name: FullPage
suffix.label: Includes all resources loaded by the page.

suffix.name: NonAdFrames.Aggregate.Total2
suffix.label: The size (in KB) of all of the page's resources except for those loaded in ad frames.

suffix.name: AdFrames.PerFrame.PeakWindowedPercent2
suffix.label: The peak load over all 30 second windows while the page is unactivated of an ad creative. This is measured as percentage of a cpu core used and capped at 100% for multicore systems. This is measured whether the frame is in the foreground or not.

suffix.name: AdFrames.PerFrame.TotalUsage2
suffix.label: The total load of an ad creative across the life of the page. This is measured in milliseconds and capped at 10 seconds. This is measured whether the frame is in the foreground or not.

suffix.name: AdFrames.Aggregate.TotalUsage2
suffix.label: The total CPU usage across all ad frames on a page in its lifetime. This is measured in milliseconds. This is measured whether a frame is in the foreground or not.

suffix.name: FullPage.PeakWindowedPercent2
suffix.label: The peak load over all 30 second windows during the lifetime of the page. This is measured as percentage of a cpu core used and capped at 100% for multicore systems. This is measured whether a frame is in the foreground or not.

suffix.name: FullPage.TotalUsage2
suffix.label: The total load of the page across its lifetime. This is measured in milliseconds and capped at 10 minutes. This is measured whether a frame is in the foreground or not.

suffix.name: NonAdFrames.Aggregate.PeakWindowedPercent2
suffix.label: The peak load over all 30 second windows during the lifetime of the page of all non-ad frame activity including that of the main frame. This is measured as percentage of a cpu core used and capped at 100% for multicore systems. This is measured whether a frame was in the foreground or not.

suffix.name: NonAdFrames.Aggregate.TotalUsage2
suffix.label: The total load of non-ad frames on page including the main frame across its lifetime. This is measured in milliseconds and capped at 10 minutes. This is measured whether a frame is in the foreground or not.

suffix.name: MainFrame
suffix.label: Only includes resources loaded directly in the main frame.

suffix.name: MainFrame.Ads
suffix.label: Only includes resources loaded directly in the main frame that were identified to be ad resources.

suffix.name: Network
suffix.label: The size (in KB) of all of resources that loaded over the network.

suffix.name: Total2
suffix.label: The size (in KB) of the resources loaded.

suffix.name: PercentAdFrames
suffix.label: The percentage of bytes loaded from within ad frames.

suffix.name: AddressOnly
suffix.label: Form has address and maybe name fields

suffix.name: AddressPlusEmail
suffix.label: Form has address, email, and maybe name fields

suffix.name: AddressPlusEmailPlusPhone
suffix.label: Form has address, email, phone, and maybe name fields

suffix.name: AddressPlusPhone
suffix.label: Form has address, phone, and maybe name fields

suffix.name: ContactOnly
suffix.label: Form has name and phone; name and email; or phone, email, and maybe name fields

suffix.name: Other
suffix.label: Another form type was encountered, such as a form with all unknown fields

suffix.name: WithMultipleLegalLines
suffix.label: When legal message has multiple lines

suffix.name: WithSameLastFourButDifferentExpiration
suffix.label: When the same last four but different expiration dates

suffix.name: SignedInAndSyncFeatureEnabled
suffix.label: Signed in and sync feature enabled

suffix.name: SignedInAndWalletSyncTransportEnabled
suffix.label: Signed in and sync transport enabled for Wallet data types

suffix.name: WithNickname
suffix.label: Credit Card has a valid nickname

suffix.name: AllowThirdParty
suffix.label: All third parties allowed on a domain

suffix.name: DomainWildcardAllowThirdParty
suffix.label: Third-party cookies allowed for a site group using a domain wildcard

suffix.name: MaxRequester
suffix.label: Maximum number of exceptions per requester

suffix.name: MaxTopLevel
suffix.label: Maximum number of exceptions per top-level

suffix.name: TemporaryAllowThirdParty
suffix.label: Third-party cookies temporarily allowed on a domain

suffix.name: ShoppingDomain
suffix.label: The context menu was shown for a link that its domain is on the Shopping domain allowlist in the Lens experiment.

suffix.name: CrOSVM
suffix.label: A client created by ChromeOS VM.

suffix.name: Legacy
suffix.label: A client using an old CRAS lib.

suffix.name: ServerStream
suffix.label: A client created by CRAS server.

suffix.name: BasedOnAutocomplete
suffix.label: Quality metrics based on autocomplete attributes.

suffix.name: HiddenWhileFlushing
suffix.label: Tab hidden while flushing FCP value.

suffix.name: BypassedDRP
suffix.label: Bytes of traffic that bypassed the Data Reduction Proxy

suffix.name: Direct
suffix.label: Bytes of traffic that were ineligible for the Data Reduction Proxy

suffix.name: Other
suffix.label: Bytes of traffic that don't fit into the other categories of Net.HttpContentLength

suffix.name: ViaDRP
suffix.label: Bytes of traffic that passed through the Data Reduction Proxy

suffix.name: Background
suffix.label: The page was backgrounded at least once from navigation start to this event.

suffix.name: AfterPaint
suffix.label: Limited to the duration of time starting after first paint, for page loads that reached first paint.

suffix.name: Clients.DataReductionProxy
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics that are a result of a navigation through the data reduction proxy.

suffix.name: Clients.Previews.LitePages
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics that are a result of a navigation through the data reduction proxy where a lite page response was received.

suffix.name: Clients.DocWrite.Block
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics from a page that has synchronous, cross-origin document.written scripts that could be blocked if the document.write script blocking feature is enabled.

suffix.name: Clients.FromGoogleSearch
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics that are a result of a navigation from a Google web search

suffix.name: Clients.LoadingPredictor2
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics with enabled LoadingPredictor. If the page is prerendered, the recorded value is modified as activation origined.

suffix.name: Preconnectable
suffix.label: The predictor database contained origins for preconnecting for a page

suffix.name: Clients.NoScriptPreview
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics that are a result of a navigation that tirggered the NoScript Preview intervention.

suffix.name: Clients.Protocol.H2
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics that are a result of a navigation to main resource over HTTP/2

suffix.name: Clients.Protocol.H11
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics that are a result of a navigation to main resource over HTTP/1.1

suffix.name: Clients.Protocol.QUIC
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics that are a result of a navigation to main resource over QUIC

suffix.name: Clients.ResourceLoadingHintsPreview
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics that are a result of a navigation that used ResourceLoadingHints to show a Preview version of the page.

suffix.name: Clients.Scheme.HTTP
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics that are a result of a navigation to a main resource where the committed URL is HTTP.

suffix.name: Clients.Scheme.HTTPS
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics that are a result of a navigation to a main resource where the committed URL is HTTPS.

suffix.name: Clients.NoServiceWorker2
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics from a page that is either not controlled by a service worker or is controlled by a service worker without a fetch event handler. This should NOT be compared to Clients.ServiceWorker2, see https://goo.gl/EdaGQn.

suffix.name: Clients.ServiceWorker2
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics from a page that is controlled by a service worker that has a fetch event handler.

suffix.name: docs
suffix.label: Custom histogram for the Google Docs page

suffix.name: search
suffix.label: Custom histogram for the Google Search results page

suffix.name: Clients.EarlyHints2.Preload
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics from a page that received preload Link headers via Early Hints responses. Recorded only for main frames. Includes samples from prerendered pages. record duration from activation start to first contentful paint for prerendered pages. PageLoad.Clients.EarlyHints.Preload.PaintTiming.NavigationToFirstContentfulPaint and PageLoad.Clients.EarlyHints.Preload.PaintTiming.NavigationToLargestContentfulPaint2 record activation start origined values for prerendered pages.

suffix.name: LoadType.NewNavigation
suffix.label: Restricted to new navigations (link clicks, URLs typed into the URL box, etc).

suffix.name: NoCommit
suffix.label: Limited to page loads that did not commit.

suffix.name: WithoutPaint
suffix.label: The foreground duration for page loads did not reach first paint.

suffix.name: WithPaint
suffix.label: The foreground duration for page loads reached first paint.

suffix.name: Clients.SignedExchange
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics for page loads for which the document was served through a signed exchange.

suffix.name: Clients.SignedExchange.AltSubSXG
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics for page loads for which the document was served with prefetched alternative subresource signed exchange.

suffix.name: Clients.SignedExchange.Cached
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics for page loads for which the document was served through a cached signed exchange.

suffix.name: Clients.SignedExchange.NotCached
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics for page loads for which the document was served through a signed exchange directly from network.

suffix.name: UserGesture
suffix.label: Restricted to pages loaded via a user gesture.

suffix.name: UserInitiated
suffix.label: (experimental) Page load metric that is approximately user initiated

suffix.name: AnyPasswordEntry
suffix.label: Password protection triggered by entering a password that matches either/both the sync password, signed-in non-syncing password, or a saved password. This is a superset of (and should be equal to or larger than) SyncPasswordEntry + SavedPasswordEntry + NonSyncPasswordEntry

suffix.name: GmailNonSyncPasswordEntry
suffix.label: Password protection triggered by entering a non-syncing gaia password that is associated with a Gmail account. This is a subset of NonSyncPasswordEntry.

suffix.name: GmailSyncPasswordEntry
suffix.label: Password protection triggered by entering the sync password that is associated with a Gmail account. This is a subset of SyncPasswordEntry.

suffix.name: GSuiteNonSyncPasswordEntry
suffix.label: Password protection triggered by entering a non-syncing gaia password that is associated with a GSuite account. This is a subset of NonSyncPasswordEntry. Note that GSuite non-sync password reuse detection is only triggered if configured appropriate enterprise policy.

suffix.name: GSuiteSyncPasswordEntry
suffix.label: Password protection triggered by entering the sync password that is associated with a GSuite account. This is a subset of SyncPasswordEntry. Note that GSuite sync password reuse detection is only triggered if configured appropriate enterprise policy.

suffix.name: NonGaiaEnterprisePasswordEntry
suffix.label: Password protection triggered by entering a password that matches a non-Gaia enterprise password. Note that non-Gaia enterprise password reuse detection is only triggered if configured appropriate enterprise policy.

suffix.name: NonSyncPasswordEntry
suffix.label: Password protection triggered by entering an unconsented primary account password.

suffix.name: PasswordFieldOnFocus
suffix.label: Password protection triggered by password field on focus event.

suffix.name: SavedPasswordEntry
suffix.label: Password protection triggered by entering a password saved in the password manager where the account is not signed-in to Google.

suffix.name: SyncPasswordEntry
suffix.label: Password protection triggered by entering the sync password, which may or may not also match a saved password. (This was called SyncProtectedPasswordEntry before M62)

suffix.name: UnknownNonPrimaryPasswordEntry
suffix.label: Password protection triggered by entering a password that does not match a primary account password but no current signed-in account is found.

suffix.name: UnknownPrimaryPasswordEntry
suffix.label: Password protection triggered by entering a password that matches a primary account password but no current signed-in account is found.

suffix.name: DuringStartup
suffix.label: Sampled once per second during the first 30 seconds after launch.

suffix.name: none
suffix.label: No origin; in the case of prefetch TTFCP this is when no prefetch was involved.

suffix.name: webcross
suffix.label: Link triggered prerender, rel=prerender, cross domain.

suffix.name: websame
suffix.label: Link triggered prerender, rel=prerender, same domain.

suffix.name: ForHTTPS
suffix.label: Only secure HTTPS connections are counted.

suffix.name: Network
suffix.label: The response directly came from network.

suffix.name: Unspecified
suffix.label: The source of a response was unspecified.

suffix.name: ColdStartup
suffix.label: Startup was cold (mostly hard faults). Threshold updated Jan 2020, metrics expected to bump.

suffix.name: WarmStartup
suffix.label: Startup was warm (almost no hard faults).
